keyboardShortcuts.focusRemote: Fokusér på en anden deltagers video

feature1.content: Ingen download kræves. __app__ virker direkte i din browser. Du skal blot dele URL til di konference for at komme igang.
feature1.title: Enkelt at anvende

feature2.content: Multi-party video konference virker med helt ned til 128Kbps. Skærmdeling og konferencer kun med lyd er muligt med endnu mindre.
feature2.title: Lav båndbredde

feature3.content: __app__ is licenseret under Apache License. Du kan frit downloade, anvende, ændre og dele det med denne licens.
feature3.title: Open source

feature4.content: Der er ingen unaturlige restriktioner på antallet af bruger og konference-deltagere. Serverkraft og båndbredde er de eneste begrænsende faktorer.
feature4.title: Ubegrænsede brugere

feature5.content: Det er let at dele din skærm med andre. __app__ er ideel for online præsentationer, forelæsninger  and tech-support sessioner.
feature5.title: Skærmdeling

feature6.content: Behov for at være privat? Konferencerum i __app__ kan sikres med kodeord for at ekskludere uønskede gæster og forhindre forstyrrelser.
feature6.title: Sikre rum

feature7.content: __app__ anvender Etherpad, en real-time kollaborativ teksteditor hvor du og konferencedeltagere sammen kan tage notater, skrive artikler eller andet.
feature7.title: Delte noter

feature8.content: Studér anvendelsemønstre gennem enkel integration med Piwik, Google analytics og andre monitorerings. og statistiksystemer
feature8.title: Anvendelsesstatistik

startupoverlay.title: __app__ har behov for adgang til dit kamera og din mikrofon.

suspendedoverlay.title: Dit videoopkald blev afbrudt fordi din computer gik i dvale.
suspendedoverlay.text: Klik Deltag igen for at forbinde til din konference.

toolbar.sharedVideoMutedPopup:
Din delte video er blevet muted så
du kan tale til de andre deltagere.
toolbar.micMutedPopup:
Din mikrofon er blevet muted så du
kan fuldt ud nyde din delte video.
toolbar.talkWhileMutedPopup: Prøver du at tale? Du er muted.
toolbar.unableToUnmutePopup: Du kan ikke un-mute imens din delte video bliver vist.

or if you already have it
then

nickname.title: Enter a nickname in the box below

connectionindicator.na: Come back here for connection information once the conference starts

notify.focusFail: __component__ er ikke tilgængeligt - prøver igen om __ms__ sec

dialog.kickMessage: Av! Du er blevet sparket ud af mødet!
dialog.popupError: Din browser blokere popupvinduer fra denne side. Tillad venligst popup i din browser's indstillinger og prøv igen.
dialog.passwordError: Denne konference er beskyttet med et kodeord. Kun ejeren af konferencen kan sætte kodeordet.
dialog.passwordError2: Denne konference er ikke beskyttet med et kodeord. Kun ejeren af konferencen kan sætte kodeordet.
dialog.connectError: Ups! Noget gik galt og vi kunne ikke forbinde til konferencen.
dialog.connectErrorWithMsg: Ups! Noget gik galt og vi kunne ikke forbinde til konferencen: __msg__
dialog.detectext: Error when trying to detect desktopsharing extension.
dialog.failtoinstall: Failed to install desktop sharing extension
dialog.failedpermissions: Failed to obtain permissions to use the local microphone and/or camera.
dialog.conferenceReloadMsg: We're trying to fix this. Reconnecting in __seconds__ sec...
dialog.conferenceDisconnectMsg: You may want to check your network connection. Reconnecting in __seconds__ sec...
dialog.maxUsersLimitReached: The limit for maximum number of participants in the conference has been reached. The conference is full. Please try again later!
dialog.passwordNotSupported: Room passwords are currently not supported.
dialog.internalError: Ups! Something went wrong. The following error occurred: [setRemoteDescription]
dialog.SLDFailure: Oops! Something went wrong and we failed to mute! (SLD Failure)
dialog.SRDFailure: Oops! Something went wrong and we failed to stop video! (SRD Failure)
dialog.shareVideoLinkError: Please provide a correct youtube link.
dialog.removeSharedVideoMsg: Are you sure you would like to remove your shared video?
dialog.alreadySharedVideoMsg: Another participant is already sharing video. This conference allows only one shared video at a time.
dialog.WaitForHostMsg: The conference __room__ has not yet started. If you are the host then please authenticate. Otherwise, please wait for the host to arrive.
dialog.logoutQuestion: Are you sure you want to logout and stop the conference?
dialog.passwordCheck: Are you sure you would like to remove your password?
dialog.passwordMsg: Set a password to lock your room
dialog.shareLink: Share the link to the call
dialog.settings3:
Require nicknames

Set a password to lock your room:
dialog.gracefulShutdown: Our service is currently down for maintenance. Please try again later.
dialog.tokenAuthFailed: Sorry, you're not allowed to join this call.
dialog.firefoxExtensionPrompt: You need to install a Firefox extension in order to use screen sharing. Please try again after you get it from here!
dialog.feedbackHelp: Your feedback will help us to improve our video experience.
dialog.sorryFeedback: We're sorry to hear that. Would you like to tell us more?
dialog.stopStreamingWarning: Are you sure you would like to stop the live streaming?
dialog.stopRecordingWarning: Are you sure you would like to stop the recording?
dialog.screenSharingPermissionDeniedError: You have not granted permission to share your screen.
dialog.micErrorPresent: There was an error connecting to your microphone.
dialog.cameraErrorPresent: There was an error connecting to your camera.
dialog.cameraUnsupportedResolutionError: Your camera does not support required video resolution.
dialog.cameraUnknownError: Cannot use camera for a unknown reason.
dialog.cameraPermissionDeniedError: You have not granted permission to use your camera. You can still join the conference but others won't see you. Use the camera button in the address bar to fix this.
dialog.cameraConstraintFailedError: Your camera does not satisfy some of the required constraints.
dialog.micUnknownError: Cannot use microphone for a unknown reason.
dialog.micPermissionDeniedError: You have not granted permission to use your microphone. You can still join the conference but others won't hear you. Use the camera button in the address bar to fix this.
dialog.micConstraintFailedError: Your microphone does not satisfy some of the required constraints.
dialog.micNotSendingData: We are unable to access your microphone. Please select another device from the settings menu or try to restart the application.
dialog.cameraNotSendingData: We are unable to access your camera. Please check if another application is using this device, select another device from the settings menu or try to restart the application.
dialog.externalInstallationMsg: You need to install our desktop sharing extension.
dialog.muteParticipantBody: You won't be able to unmute them, but they can unmute themselves at any time.
dialog.remoteControlRequestMessage: Will you allow __user__ to remotely control your desktop?
dialog.remoteControlShareScreenWarning: Note that if you press "Allow" you will share your screen!
dialog.remoteControlErrorMessage: An error occurred while trying to request remote control permissions from __user__!

sharedKey: Denne konference er beskyttet med et kodeord. Brug venligst følgenede kode for at deltage:
email.subject: Invitation til __appName__ (__conferenceName__)
body: Hejsa, Jeg vil gerne invitere dig til en __appName__ konference jeg lige har oprettet.
Klik på følgende link for at deltage i konferencen.
Bemærk at __appName__ kun er supporteret af __supportedBrowsers__ så du er nødt til at bruge en af de browsere.

connection.RECONNECTING: Der opstod et netværksproblem. Prøver igen...
connection.LOW_BANDWIDTH: Video for __displayName__ er slået fra for at spare båndbredde

recording.pending: Recording waiting for a participant to join...
recording.unavailable: Optagelsesservicen er optaget. Prøv igen senere.

liveStreaming.unavailable: The live streaming service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
liveStreaming.streamIdRequired: Please fill in the stream id in order to launch the live streaming.
liveStreaming.busy: Alle optagere er i brug. Prøv igen senere.

invite.locked: This call is locked. New callers must have the link and enter the password to join.
invite.unlocked: This call is unlocked. Any new caller with the link may join the call.
